verses.verse: Woe<WH1945> to Ariel,<WH740> to Ariel,<WH740> the city<WH7151> where David<WH1732> dwelled!<WH2583> add<WH5595> you year<WH8141> to year;<WH8141> let them kill<WH5362> sacrifices.<WH2282>
Yet I will distress<WH6693> Ariel,<WH740> and there shall be heaviness<WH8386> and sorrow:<WH592> and it shall be to me as Ariel.<WH740>
And I will camp<WH2583> against<WH5921> you round<WH1754> about, and will lay siege<WH6696> against<WH5921> you with a mount,<WH4674> and I will raise<WH6965> forts<WH4694> against<WH5921> you.

And you shall be brought<WH8213> down,<WH8213> and shall speak<WH1696> out of the ground,<WH776> and your speech<WH565> shall be low<WH7817> out of the dust,<WH6083> and your voice<WH6963> shall be, as of one that has a familiar spirit,<WH178> out of the ground,<WH776> and your speech<WH565> shall whisper<WH6850> out of the dust.<WH6083>

Moreover the multitude<WH1995> of your strangers<WH2114> shall be like small<WH1851> dust,<WH80> and the multitude<WH1995> of the terrible<WH6184> ones shall be as chaff<WH4671> that passes<WH5674> away: yes, it shall be at an instant<WH6621> suddenly.<WH6597>

You shall be visited<WH6485> of the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> with thunder,<WH7482> and with earthquake,<WH7494> and great<WH1419> noise,<WH6963> with storm<WH5492> and tempest,<WH5591> and the flame<WH3851> of devouring<WH398> fire.<WH784>

And the multitude<WH1995> of all<WH3605> the nations<WH1471> that fight<WH6633> against<WH5921> Ariel,<WH740> even all<WH3605> that fight<WH6633> against her and her fortification,<WH4685> and that distress<WH6693> her, shall be as a dream<WH2472> of a night<WH3915> vision.<WH2377>

It shall even be as when<WH834> an hungry<WH7456> man dreams,<WH2492> and, behold,<WH2009> he eats;<WH398> but he wakes,<WH6974> and his soul<WH5315> is empty:<WH7385> or as when<WH834> a thirsty<WH6771> man dreams,<WH2492> and, behold,<WH2009> he drinks;<WH8354> but he wakes,<WH6974> and, behold,<WH2009> he is faint,<WH5889> and his soul<WH5315> has appetite:<WH8264> so<WH3652> shall the multitude<WH1995> of all<WH3605> the nations<WH1471> be, that fight<WH6633> against<WH5921> mount<WH2022> Zion.<WH6726>
Stay<WH4102> yourselves, and wonder;<WH8539> cry<WH8173> you out, and cry:<WH8173> they are drunken,<WH7937> but not with wine;<WH3196> they stagger,<WH5128> but not with strong drink.<WH7941>

For the LORD<WH3068> has poured<WH5258> out on you the spirit<WH7307> of deep<WH8639> sleep,<WH8639> and has closed<WH6105> your eyes:<WH5869> the prophets<WH5030> and your rulers,<WH7218> the seers<WH2374> has he covered.<WH3680>

And the vision<WH2380> of all<WH3605> is become<WH1961> to you as the words<WH1697> of a book<WH5612> that is sealed,<WH2856> which<WH834> men deliver<WH5414> to one that is learned,<WH3045> <WH5612> saying,<WH559> Read<WH7121> this,<WH2088> I pray<WH4994> you: and he said,<WH559> I cannot;<WH3808> <WH3201> for it is sealed:<WH2856>

And the book<WH5612> is delivered<WH5414> to him that is not learned,<WH3045> <WH5612> saying,<WH559> Read<WH7121> this,<WH2088> I pray<WH4994> you: and he said,<WH559> I am not learned.<WH3045> <WH5612>

Why the Lord<WH136> said,<WH559> For as much<WH3282> <WH365> as this<WH2063> people<WH5971> draw near<WH5066> me with their mouth,<WH6310> and with their lips<WH8193> do honor<WH3513> me, but have removed<WH7368> their heart<WH3820> far<WH7368> from me, and their fear<WH3374> toward<WH854> me is taught<WH3925> by the precept<WH4687> of men:<WH582>

Therefore,<WH3651> behold,<WH2005> I will proceed<WH3254> to do a marvelous<WH6381> work<WH6381> among this<WH2088> people,<WH5971> even a marvelous<WH6381> work<WH6381> and a wonder:<WH6382> for the wisdom<WH2451> of their wise<WH2450> men shall perish,<WH6> and the understanding<WH998> of their prudent<WH995> men shall be hid.<WH5641>

Woe<WH1945> to them that seek deep<WH6009> to hide<WH5641> their counsel<WH6098> from the LORD,<WH3068> and their works<WH4639> are in the dark,<WH4285> and they say,<WH559> Who<WH4310> sees<WH7200> us? and who<WH4310> knows<WH3045> us?

Surely<WH518> your turning<WH2017> of things upside down shall be esteemed<WH2803> as the potter's<WH3335> clay:<WH2563> for shall the work<WH4639> say<WH559> of him that made<WH6213> it, He made<WH6213> me not? or shall the thing framed<WH3336> say<WH559> of him that framed<WH3335> it, He had no<WH3808> understanding?<WH995>

Is it not yet<WH5750> a very<WH4213> little<WH4592> while, and Lebanon<WH3844> shall be turned<WH7725> into a fruitful<WH3759> field, and the fruitful<WH3759> field shall be esteemed<WH2803> as a forest?<WH3293>

And in that day<WH3117> shall the deaf<WH2795> hear<WH8085> the words<WH1697> of the book,<WH5612> and the eyes<WH5869> of the blind<WH5787> shall see<WH7200> out of obscurity,<WH652> and out of darkness.<WH2822>
The meek<WH6035> also shall increase<WH3254> their joy<WH8057> in the LORD,<WH3068> and the poor<WH34> among men<WH120> shall rejoice<WH1523> in the Holy<WH6918> One of Israel.<WH3478>
For the terrible<WH6184> one is brought<WH656> to nothing,<WH656> and the scorner<WH3887> is consumed,<WH3615> and all<WH3605> that watch<WH8245> for iniquity<WH205> are cut<WH3772> off:

That make a man<WH120> an offender<WH2398> for a word,<WH1697> and lay a snare<WH6983> for him that reproves<WH3198> in the gate,<WH8179> and turn<WH5186> aside<WH5186> the just<WH6662> for a thing of nothing.<WH8414>

Therefore<WH3651> thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD,<WH3068> who<WH834> redeemed<WH6299> Abraham,<WH85> concerning<WH413> the house<WH1004> of Jacob,<WH3290> Jacob<WH3290> shall not now<WH6258> be ashamed,<WH954> neither<WH3808> shall his face<WH6440> now wax pale.<WH2357>

But when<WH3588> he sees<WH7200> his children,<WH3206> the work<WH4639> of my hands,<WH3027> in the middle<WH7130> of him, they shall sanctify<WH6942> my name,<WH8034> and sanctify<WH6942> the Holy<WH6918> One of Jacob,<WH3290> and shall fear<WH6206> the God<WH430> of Israel.<WH3478>
They also that erred<WH8582> in spirit<WH7307> shall come<WH3045> to understanding,<WH998> and they that murmured<WH7279> shall learn<WH3925> doctrine.<WH3948>
